game.description: Explore the ancient ruins and uncover the secrets of a long-lost civilization.
game.objective: Retrieve the fabled Golden Idol and return it to the village elder.
game.quest_giver: The Village Elder, located in the village at the foot of the mountain.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the gratitude of the village elder.

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous jungle to reach the ancient ruins.
tasks.location: The dense jungle to the east of the village.
tasks.objective: Find a way through the overgrown path without triggering any traps.

tasks.description: Solve the puzzle in the central chamber to unlock the next area.
tasks.location: The central chamber deep within the ancient ruins.
tasks.objective: Figure out how to align the ancient artifacts to reveal the hidden door.

game.title: The Lost Idol of the Ancients
